venue.address_1: Corner of High and Congress, Downtown Portland. In front of the Entrance
venue.name: Portland Museum of Art

item.description: Me and my best friend on a clear and sunny day are looking for ANYONE of ANY biking style and background that would like to ride with us to Old Orchard Beach to enjoy the sights on the way and in the town and enjoy the ride back. My name is Randy and I ride and all black Urban Freestyle MTB Giant STP-2 and I wear a black MX helmet. My email is randy.ussery@yahoo.com
item.name: On to O O B
